title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not working in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the label is still visible in the generated PDF preview.
EB: The label should disappear in the generated PDF when the display property is set to 'none'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a label.
2. Open the 'properties' view.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'.
